title: macOS Sierra Issues
body:
Ever since I updated my macbook Pro to macOS Sierra, League has been running extremely slow. I don't know if anyone else has this issue, but my model is a MacBook Pro (13-Inch, Mid 2012) It was running perfectly until i updated the OS. Did not expect to run into heavy compatibility problems. Just posting for intel regarding the Mac Userbase.

If you are using a Mac and updated to Sierra, please use the poll below to signify if you too have had any issues or not.
Thanks

PS: Feel free to discuss your own issues, as mine may not be the only issues users are experiencing during this time.

replies.body:
I appreciate you taking the initiative to create a tracker like this. We're currently tracking most of the issues with macOS Sierra + League in [this post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra)

Let me know if you have any questions.
